terms.description: Nouns in Tamil language are classified based on திணை into two categories. They are உயர்திணை [u-y-a-r-th-i-N-ai] and அஃறிணை [a-h-R-i-N-ai]

terms.definition: உயர்திணை is used to denote Gods and people who are knowlegable
All living and non living thins which are not உயர்திணை are அஃறிணை
Names which are common to both உயர்திணை and அஃறிணை
terms.description:
பொது - common; Examples: சூரியன், தந்தை
அவன் சூரியன்

terms.definition: New words introduced in this section
terms.description: மதியன் - Wise man; திருமால் - Lord Vishnu; பூனை - cat; மண் - soil; கல் - stone
